transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha Darshan ji se baat ho rahi hai sir India Mart se Rahil baat kar raha hu sir aapse baat hui thi last Friday.
Customer: Boliye
Executive: Friday hi baat hui thi. Sir wo training dena tha na aapne bola tha ki kuch training ke liye.
Customer: Ha ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Ha to sir aapko hi dena hai.
Customer: Ha ha mujhe.
Executive: Ha to mai aapko na link share kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Ha kijiye.
Executive: Sir isi whatsapp pe kar du?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Whatsapp pe hi kar de raha hu na. Mail pe kar diya hai whatsapp pe bhi kar de raha hu, thik hai.
Customer: Ha whatsapp pe kar dijiye.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir ek second na bhej raha hu ek second.
Executive: Aa gayi?
Customer: Aa gayi sir wo maine aapko usme bheja hai mail par bheja hai link.
Executive: Ha mail par mail par bhi aa gaya join kar lu?
Executive: Ha ha join kijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs training.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the training link.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- training, link sharing, follow up
